senses.de: Having knowledge or consciousness of something.
senses.ex: Please be aware of the slippery floor.
cl: be aware of the latest developments

Tips.title: Giving warnings
Tips.description: Use 'be aware of' to warn someone about potential hazards or important information.
Tips.example: Be aware of the falling rocks in this area.

Tips.title: Highlighting information
Tips.description: Use 'be aware of' to draw attention to specific facts or circumstances.
Tips.example: Be aware of the new regulations before you submit your application.

conscious of.wordDefinition: 'Conscious of' often implies a more deliberate and thoughtful awareness, while 'be aware of' can be more general.

know about.wordDefinition: 'Know about' suggests having information about something, while 'be aware of' implies being mindful or vigilant about it.
